column4: I only have 2 USB ports right now. Before I get a splitter.....is there a way I can use my keyboard as my mouse, so that I can use 1 port for the OS USB and one port for the wifi adapter?
some keyboards have usb ports built in them for mice, etc.
then all you could do is get a hub or new keyboard, or use accessability settings to use keyboard keys to move your mouse pointer, but... that's inefficient.
oh if thats what you want, yes, its in accessability settings I do believe
